title: kungiliyam vAngalayO
sahitya:
kungiliyam vAngalayoO kungiliyam kuTramillAda nan shivanArkku kumbiTTu pODa namabahamAna


anupallavi

  ingidai vAngina pErukku yama bhayam irukkAdu emanum annikki vAngiyirundAkkAl Ekkamum vandirukkAdu pongum manam idaikkATTilum vEroru puNNiyamum irukkAdu pOnAl pOgaTTum enru irundAkkal ponnAna kAlam mINDum vArAdu


caraNam    tukkANi kAshukku shIrangai mEnikku vittu varEn bhEramillai sundara dEshikar vITTukkum nErE pOi kETTukungo vazhak vazhakkillai takkArukkoNNAga pEsi koLLa Edum buddhi keTTuppOgavillai sarakkayum pAttuTTu eriyavum viTTuTTu taralAm kAsu kuttamillai
					(madhyamakAla)
Ayiram lakSam kudirai vitturukkEn anda paDi oru kAlam AzhAkku piTTukku kUli vElai seidEn appaDiyum oru kAlam
tUyamAna vaLaiceTTi enrellOrum sonnArgaL adoru kAlam dhUpam kamazhavum kungiliyam enru solli viTTu varEn idoru kAlam
